title: Respond to Online Listing Inquiry
description: A potential buyer asks a question about a specific property via an online portal. The agent needs to respond.

tasks.description: Identify the property the inquiry is about and the person's specific question (e.g., 'What are the HOA fees?').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the property and the question being asked.

tasks.description: Look up the answer in the MLS listing details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the monthly HOA fee is $250.

tasks.description: Reply to the inquiry with the answer and ask a follow-up question to engage them (e.g., 'Would you like to schedule a time to see it?').
tasks.expected_outcome: A helpful response is sent, and the lead is added to the CRM.
